title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You could be tempted to match ire with fire today. Someones insistence to speak without listening presses the limits of your patience. Its definitely exasperating not to be heard but all your added bluster might do is cause a bigger blaze between you. You cant force change when wrath smothers reason. The wiser course may be to retreat now until calmer minds and hearts can prevail. Thankfully, your mind clears once youre out of each other's eyesight. Your natural empathy returns, paving the way for a sweeter conversation when you reunite. The power of peace is within you. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
